message: Hi Bob, I'm selling this amazing product. It's worth a lot to me, but I'm willing to let it go for $10,000. Let me know what you think!
Hello Alice, I appreciate your offer, but I believe I can only pay $8,000 for the product.
Bob, I understand your position, but $8,000 is simply too low for me. How about we meet in the middle at $9,000?  This would be a good deal for both of us.
Alice, thank you for considering my position. I am still unable to pay more than $8,000 for the product. Could we possibly meet closer to my offer?
Bob, I'm willing to be flexible, but $8,000 is still a long way from what I need.  I'm happy to come down to $9,500.  This is my final offer before I move on to other potential buyers.
Alice, I appreciate your willingness to negotiate. I am still only able to pay $8,000 for the product. I hope this aligns better with your needs.
